mapper.select: SELECT dt, SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) AS good_qty, SUM(PLAN_QTY) AS prod_qty, CASE WHEN SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) = 0 OR SUM(PLAN_QTY) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) * 100.0 / SUM(PLAN_QTY), 1) END AS per FROM ( SELECT A.dt AS dt, (SELECT SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS C WHERE C.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ AND C.ISUSABLE = 'Usable') AS FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM, B.PLAN_QTY FROM CheckDayOff A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.dt = B.WORK_DATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND B.MATERIALID = #{materialid} AND B.SHIFTID LIKE '%AM' AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND B.LINEID = (SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION WHERE FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) ) AS D GROUP BY dt ORDER BY dt;

SELECT dt, SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) AS good_qty, SUM(PLAN_QTY) AS prod_qty, CASE WHEN SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) = 0 OR SUM(PLAN_QTY) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM) * 100.0 / SUM(PLAN_QTY), 1) END AS per FROM ( SELECT A.dt AS dt, (SELECT SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS C WHERE C.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ AND C.ISUSABLE = 'Usable') AS FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY_SUM, B.PLAN_QTY FROM CheckDayOff A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.dt = B.WORK_DATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND B.MATERIALID = #{materialid} AND B.SHIFTID LIKE '%PM' AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND B.LINEID = (SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION WHERE FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) ) AS D GROUP BY dt ORDER BY dt;

SELECT SUM(PROD_QTY)AS TOTALPROD_QTY ,SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY)AS TOTALFAIL_QTY, SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY)AS TOTAL_GOOD, ROUND(SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) + SUM(B.FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY), 0), 3) AS PER FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ =B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE A.WORK_DATE =CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND A.MATERIALID =#{materialid} AND A.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND B.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL

SELECT COALESCE (SUM( DATEDIFF(SECOND, CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.WORKTIME_FROM, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108), CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.WORKTIME_TO, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108) )) ,0)AS UPTIME FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.LINEID =( SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION dl WHERE 1 = 1 AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable'

SELECT COALESCE (SUM( DATEDIFF(SECOND, CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM , 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108), CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.NOTOPERATETIME_TO, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108) )) ,0)AS DOWNTIME FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.LINEID =( SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION dl WHERE 1 = 1 AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC )AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable'

SELECT AA.dt, SUM(BB.GOOD_QTY), SUM(BB.PLAN_QTY), ROUND((SUM(BB.GOOD_QTY))*100.0/NULLIF((SUM(BB.PLAN_QTY)),0),1)AS per FROM CheckDayOff AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.WORK_DATE, (SELECT SUM(FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY) FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS C WHERE C.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND C.ISUSABLE = 'Usable') AS GOOD_QTY, A.PLAN_QTY FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ = B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND MATERIALID = #{materialid} AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND A.LINEID = (SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION WHERE FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) GROUP BY A.WORK_DATE, A.PLAN_QTY, A.DATASEQ )BB ON AA.dt = BB.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND AA.dt BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) GROUP BY AA.dt ORDER BY AA.dt;

SELECT AA.dt, BB.PROD,BB. GOOD,BB.FAIL, ROUND((BB.FAIL)*100.0 / NULLIF((BB.FAIL+BB.GOOD),0),1) AS per FROM CheckDayOff AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.WORK_DATE, SUM(B.PROD_QTY) AS PROD, SUM(B.FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY) AS GOOD, SUM(B.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) AS FAIL FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ = B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND MATERIALID = #{materialid} AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' GROUP BY A.WORK_DATE )BB ON AA.dt = BB.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND AA.dt BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) ORDER BY AA.dt;

SELECT AA.dt, SUM(BB.NOTOPERATE_TIME) AS NOTOPERATE_TIME FROM CheckDayOff AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.WORK_DATE, (SELECT SUM(C.NOTOPERATE_TIME) FROM( SELECT B.WORKDAILY_SEQ, DATEDIFF(SECOND, (SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,1,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,3,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM,5,2)) , (SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,1,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,3,2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(B.NOTOPERATETIME_TO,5,2))) AS NOTOPERATE_TIME FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS B WHERE B.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable' ) C WHERE C.WORKDAILY_SEQ = A.DATASEQ ) AS NOTOPERATE_TIME FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND MATERIALID = #{materialid} AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' )BB ON AA.dt = BB.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND AA.dt BETWEEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, -13, #{workDate}), 112) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 0, #{workDate}), 112) GROUP BY AA.dt ORDER BY AA.dt;
